overview: The syllabus of Campus Confessions #2 is packed with gorgeous BARELY LEGAL alumnae who are always ready to bone up on Sex Ed. Although these babes sometimes have trouble with the written part of their tests, they always ace the oral exams - and the anal ones too. Threesomes make it easy for these studious sweeties to have fun with numbers, but they know that the best way to keep up their GPAs is to go down on a professor's meaty pointer. Enroll in Campus Confessions #2, and these scholarly sluts will teach you all of their kinkiest study tricks.
title: Campus Confessions 2
